data.oai_dc:dc: State matrix (nsite x nyear) of observations. 0 = non visited site or missing data, 1 = species not detected (i.e., either dry or wet site), 2 = species detected (i.e., necessarily a wet site).
Community: dynamics|Demography|Ecology: population|Fragmentation|Life history: ecology|Metacommunities|Metapopulations|Modeling: ecological|Modeling: population ecology|Population: dynamics
